pullRequest.body:
After this PR, no file in `Geometry` uses autoImplicit, and in `Analysis` it's scoped to six declarations.

---

Can be reviewed commit by commit. (I can move the last one into a separate PR if desired.)

<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: :v: grunweg can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks for the review!
bors r+

I'll be happy to make the exact_mod_cast change in a follow-up, once I understand the error.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7542954233/job/20532901989)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7542954233/job/20532901360)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7542954233/job/20532900910)
maybe add `n` to this one, to avoid it in the next three lemmas?

I tried this! But it interferes with the four lemmas still using autoImplicit: each proof by `exact_mod_cast of_decide_eq_true h` errors with an error 

```
mod_cast has type
  @OfNat.ofNat ℚ 1
      (@One.toOfNat1 ℚ
        (@AddMonoidWithOne.toOne ℚ
          (@AddGroupWithOne.toAddMonoidWithOne ℚ (@Ring.toAddGroupWithOne ℚ NormedRing.toRing)))) <
    ↑n / ↑d : Prop
but is expected to have type
  @OfNat.ofNat ℝ 1
      (@One.toOfNat1 ℝ
        (@AddMonoidWithOne.toOne ℝ
          (@AddGroupWithOne.toAddMonoidWithOne ℝ (@Ring.toAddGroupWithOne ℝ Real.instRingReal)))) <
    ↑n / ↑d : Prop.
```
I don't know off-hand how to fix that. (It would be a welcome follow-up cleanup!)

```suggestion
@[simp] theorem zero_iff_nonpos {x : ℝ} : expNegInvGlue x = 0 ↔ x ≤ 0 :=
```

```suggestion
variable {V' P' : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup V'] [InnerProductSpace ℝ V'] [MetricSpace P']
```
Just to match the order above.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Analysis,Geometry): remove almost all autoImplicit

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - doc(Geometry/Manifold/LieGroup): extend and clean up docstrings
